title: tidy contrib/ltr exception differentiation
description: I noticed discrepancies when trying to add class-level javadocs under SOLR-10005 ticket.

comments.content:
attaching patch:

	use ModelException instead of FeatureException use in LTRScoringModel
	add StoreException for use by (Feature|Model)Store
comments.author: Christine Poerschke

comments.content: Move issue from deprecated 'In  Progress' back to 'Open'
